verses.name: Genesis 5:1
verses.text: This is the book of the generations of Adam. In the day that God created man, in the likeness of God made he him;

verses.name: Genesis 5:2
verses.text: Male and female created he them; and blessed them, and called their name Adam, in the day when they were created.

verses.name: Genesis 5:3
verses.text: And Adam lived an hundred and thirty years, and begat a son in his own likeness, after his image; and called his name Seth:

verses.name: Genesis 5:4
verses.text: And the days of Adam after he had begotten Seth were eight hundred years: and he begat sons and daughters:

verses.name: Genesis 5:5
verses.text: And all the days that Adam lived were nine hundred and thirty years: and he died.

verses.name: Genesis 5:6
verses.text: And Seth lived an hundred and five years, and begat Enos:

verses.name: Genesis 5:7
verses.text: And Seth lived after he begat Enos eight hundred and seven years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.name: Genesis 5:8
verses.text: And all the days of Seth were nine hundred and twelve years: and he died.

verses.name: Genesis 5:9
verses.text: And Enos lived ninety years, and begat Cainan:

verses.name: Genesis 5:10
verses.text: And Enos lived after he begat Cainan eight hundred and fifteen years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.name: Genesis 5:11
verses.text: And all the days of Enos were nine hundred and five years: and he died.

verses.name: Genesis 5:12
verses.text: And Cainan lived seventy years, and begat Mahalaleel:

verses.name: Genesis 5:13
verses.text: And Cainan lived after he begat Mahalaleel eight hundred and forty years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.name: Genesis 5:14
verses.text: And all the days of Cainan were nine hundred and ten years: and he died.

verses.name: Genesis 5:15
verses.text: And Mahalaleel lived sixty and five years, and begat Jared:

verses.name: Genesis 5:16
verses.text: And Mahalaleel lived after he begat Jared eight hundred and thirty years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.name: Genesis 5:17
verses.text: And all the days of Mahalaleel were eight hundred ninety and five years: and he died.

verses.name: Genesis 5:18
verses.text: And Jared lived an hundred sixty and two years, and he begat Enoch:

verses.name: Genesis 5:19
verses.text: And Jared lived after he begat Enoch eight hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.name: Genesis 5:20
verses.text: And all the days of Jared were nine hundred sixty and two years: and he died.

verses.name: Genesis 5:21
verses.text: And Enoch lived sixty and five years, and begat Methuselah:

verses.name: Genesis 5:22
verses.text: And Enoch walked with God after he begat Methuselah three hundred years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.name: Genesis 5:23
verses.text: And all the days of Enoch were three hundred sixty and five years:

verses.name: Genesis 5:24
verses.text: And Enoch walked with God: and he was not; for God took him.

verses.name: Genesis 5:25
verses.text: And Methuselah lived an hundred eighty and seven years, and begat Lamech:

verses.name: Genesis 5:26
verses.text: And Methuselah lived after he begat Lamech seven hundred eighty and two years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.name: Genesis 5:27
verses.text: And all the days of Methuselah were nine hundred sixty and nine years: and he died.

verses.name: Genesis 5:28
verses.text: And Lamech lived an hundred eighty and two years, and begat a son:

verses.name: Genesis 5:29
verses.text: And he called his name Noah, saying, This same shall comfort us concerning our work and toil of our hands, because of the ground which the Lord hath cursed.

verses.name: Genesis 5:30
verses.text: And Lamech lived after he begat Noah five hundred ninety and five years, and begat sons and daughters:

verses.name: Genesis 5:31
verses.text: And all the days of Lamech were seven hundred seventy and seven years: and he died.

verses.name: Genesis 5:32
verses.text: And Noah was five hundred years old: and Noah begat Shem, Ham, and Japheth.
